short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your new tab with Halloween images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your new tab with spooky Halloween-themed images while staying organized! This extension not only transforms your browsing experience with a festive collection of eerie backgrounds featuring pumpkins, haunted houses, ghosts, and more, but it also includes a handy To Do List and customizable settings. Perfect for setting the mood and keeping track of your tasks during the Halloween season!
